item.title: Large pothole by cemetery gates, 5th February
item.description:
This large pot hole in the road by the cemetery gates is a danger as it is large and unlit so visibility is poor. Has caused me an instant flat tyre on the way to work this morning.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lodge Hill, East Wickham, Greater London

item.title: Problem marked as 'resolved', not resolved, 5th February
item.description:
The bulky items have been removed, but the fire exit is still obscured by so much slippery litter, piles of food waste and mess. It's still not safe for a fire exit, and the amount of litter still there will just encourage more fly tipping in no time.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Geffrye Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large branch needs removing from path in St Blaise Ave, 5th February
item.description:
A branch had fallen during the recent high winds. It’s in St Blaise Avenue, nearer to Harwood Avenue than Rochester Avenue. It’s blocking the pathway. Please can it be removed. Many thanks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St. Blaise Avenue, Plaistow, Greater London
